actionTemplate.title: Petite Euro Brow
steps: Keep the front structured (not boxy) and the arch more defined
Outline a crisp top line and arch with a pencil
Maintain a clean lower edge and taper the tail
Use powder to soften the front; deepen arch and tail
Brush and clean edges with concealer for sharp structure

rationaleTemplate: More sculpted and camera-friendly; fits Euro-style makeup.
A structured brow boosts facial contrast.
